channel.title: 667/700 Removing the Matrix Logo
channel.description: I'm not sure if this has already been released or if anybody still needs it but oh well. This is really more of a snippet so if i need to move it then that is fine. Anyways, in the client open class CacheNode_Sub15 and search [code]widget.decode(new BufferedStream(bs));[/code] Change it to [code] if(i_7_ != 744 || i_9_ != 23) widget.decode(new BufferedStream(bs)); }[/code] And that should be it. There may be more but that removed it for me.

item.title: 667/700 Removing the Matrix Logo
